revised_title: Vitamin A Research in Marine Life: Discoveries and Challenges
tldr: This article discusses the research on vitamin A in marine animals, focusing on its occurrence, distribution, and role in vision. The author highlights the discovery of different isomers of vitamin A in crustaceans and their potential role in scotopic vision. The article also explores the challenges in understanding the conversion of precursors and the role of astaxanthin in marine productivity.
